OOC: Fairly weak? I doubt anyone is going to do a fairly weak bot like you =
think. But you know what? YOU listen! It took me a year to gain respect in =
this RPG! It took several months before people would acknowledge my charact=
ers existed, and I have been treated bad for a long time, almost a year aft=
er my joining, because I didn't know anything about the RPG, wrote posts on=
ly thinking about myself, and posts that happened way too fast, and then wo=
ndered why people didn't reply. I didn't get the point, that they couldn't =
reply to my posts, because they were so confused. However, I never complain=
ed about it. I spoke up when I thought something was weird, and I defended =
myself, but I never complained or took shots at anyone for no reason. I had=
 to be provoked before saying anything to anyone. In fact, when I didn't un=
derstand the rules, I broke one by mistake, and what did I get? Sorry that =
was a mode? No! I got "Listen you idiot." From Zardus! Hell, I gave JP a ch=
ance, and he rubbed my face in the dirt. You're going to have to get used t=
o treating others how you want to be treated, Dewboy. It's a hard experienc=
e adapting to a new RPG, but I think your going about things all wrong if y=
ou want to be successful. I admire your determination, but you are still gr=
eedy, stubborn, and selfish. Oh, and Dewboy, one of the reasons I was hated=
 so much, is because I typed in Caps...

  ----- Original Message -----
  F=
